page.title: 18Transport in Hungerford.
page.content: Hungerford has both a railway station and a bus service although there is no bus station.Thamesdown operate a bus service from Hungerford to Swindon once a day on Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays with a journey time of 64 minutes.On Fridays, Saturdays there is a new express service linking Swindon,Marlborough, Hungerford,Newbury and Reading with journey times of 14 minutes to Swindon and 55 to Reading. On our survey people felt a regular bus service to Newbury in particular would be of benefit.As no buses run on Tuesdays or Thursdays anyone who lives in Hungerford without a car is reliant upon the train service.British Rail run 13 trains per day through Hungerford from Westbury in the west to Newbury, with connections on to Reading.
